DOC.brief_summary: No study investigate effect supine thoracic spine manipulation ( TSM ) neurodynamic mobility , compare sham intervention . This study aim determine immediate effect TSM Upper Limb Provocation Test ( ULPT ) Seated Slump Test ( SST ) compare sham intervention asymptomatic subject neurodynamic limitation .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Thoracic Spine Manipulation Peripheral Neurodynamic Mobility
DOC.detailed_description: A convenience sample utilized obtain subject . Subjects give brief questionnaire identify possible contraindication spinal treatment technique exclude individual necessary . Subjects randomize one two group ( spinal manual therapy spinal range motion serve name placebo group ) participate neurodynamic testing procedure upper extremity ( Upper Limb Provocation Testing ) well low extremity ( Seated Slump Test ) . Subjects determine positive one limb receive either thoracic spine manipulation technique ( spinal manual therapy ) thoracic spine sham manipulation technique ( spinal range motion/placebo ) . After application technique , previously positive limb retested . In attempt determine validity believability sham procedure perception effect , subject ask believe upper/lower quarter mobility change base group name technique apply . Subjects also ask believe treatment placebo group .
DOC.criteria: Upper Limb Provocation Test result limitation great 60 deg elbow extension time measurement Seated Slump Test result limitation great 22 deg knee extension time measurement History cervical lumbar pain require medical intervention within last two year , history upper low extremity paresthesia/numbness , self report bone density disorder , previous spinal cord injury , diagnose intervertebral disc herniation , previous diagnosis spinal stenosis disc pathology , current pregnancy , history circulatory neurological disorder , history spine extremity fracture dislocation last two year
